general.description: For handling of one or two pallets in beverage industries and breweries.

features: In the year 1993, with the invention of the unique Shaft Guide System for multiple pallet handlers, combining for the first time an optimum of operational visibility, safe working conditions, lowest life cycle cost with a high level of efficiency and reliability, MEYER already at that time anticipated trends in the forklift truck industry that are today�s expectations in full maintenance operations.

The idea to introduce hard chromed and precision machined shafts in combination with encapsulated high-performance bushings instead of an open profile system assures advantages, which only such an encapsulated guidance system can:
Excellent operation speed for highest turnover rate
Optimum smooth running, highly synchronisation of fork travel
Robust Shaft Guide Concept: no sagging of the outer forks, permanently safe transport
High energy efficiency for extended operation cycles of electric forklift trucks
Long life of consumable wearing components
Low grease requirement, no grease emersion
Clean load � clean environment!

general.description: Enhence your load protection from damages to the top.

features: The new Bolzoni Auramo Force-Matic generation 4, is an innovative, fully automatic mechanical, pressure control system designed specifically for clamp equipped forklifts. Mainly is Force-Matic an effective system designed to prevent over clamping when handling home appliances but can also be used with other clamps.

Force-Matic optimizes clamping force with preset clamping factor by adjusting the clamping force according to the load weight. The valve works basically as a mechanical calculator which continuously adjusts the clamping pressure as a function of load weight.
Installation and adjustments are quite straightforward and can be done using normal tools. Force-Matic main features:
Effective pressure control device.
Prevent carton deformation by adjusting the clamping pressure according to the load's weight.
Fully mechanical, no electrical connections required.
Fully enclosed.
Heavy duty aluminum construction.
Built around standard hydraulic components for easy service.
Wide adjustability range to be used to most truck-clamp combinations.
Can be installed on Bolzoni Auramo clamps (Consult Bolzoni for information).
Easy installation and minimum maintenance.
Unique with Force-Matic is that it works with two separate hydraulic circuits.
Circuit 1 measures hydraulic force in lift mast cylinder and calculates load's weight.
Circuit 2 regulates clamping force automatically with input from circuit 1.
These two hydraulic circuits are connected mechanically with link shown in picture on the right. This link can be adjusted to give the right balance between load weight and optimal clamping force.

With two separate hydraulic circuits Force-Matic will be able to have a wide operation range. From low initial clamping force up to max required clamping force with high stability. In addition this new system gives good speed of operation of the home appliance clamp.
Our goal is to have a clamp fitted with Force-Matic which shall be operator friendly and operate like standard clamp!

general.description: Give a boost to your paper roll handling! Find your damage free handling solutions.

features: The new Bolzoni Auramo Force-Matic generation 4, is an innovative, fully automatic mechanical, pressure control system designed specifically for clamp equipped forklifts. Mainly is Force-Matic an effective system designed to prevent over clamping when handling paper rolls but can also be used with other clamps.

Force-Matic optimizes clamping force with preset clamping factor by adjusting the clamping force according to the load weight. The valve works basically as a mechanical calculator which continuously adjusts the clamping pressure as a function of load weight.
Installation and adjustments are quite straightforward and can be done using normal tools. Force-Matic main features:
Effective pressure control device.
Prevent paper roll deformation by adjusting the clamping pressure according to the roll's weight.
Fully mechanical, no electrical connections required.
Fully enclosed.
Heavy duty aluminum construction.
Built around standard hydraulic components for easy service.
Wide adjustability range to be used to most truck-clamp combinations.
Can be installed on Bolzoni Auramo clamps (Consult Bolzoni for information).
Easy installation and minimum maintenance.
Unique with Force-Matic is that it works with two separate hydraulic circuits.
Circuit 1 measures hydraulic force in lift mast cylinder and calculates roll weight.
Circuit 2 regulates clamping force automatically with input from circuit 1.
These two hydraulic circuits are connected mechanically with link shown in picture on the right. This link can be adjusted to give the right balance between load weight and optimal clamping force.

With two separate hydraulic circuits Force-Matic will be able to have a wide operation range. From low initial clamping force up to max required clamping force with high stability. In addition this new system gives good speed of operation of the paper roll clamp.
Our goal is to have a clamp fitted with Force-Matic which shall be operator friendly and operate like standard clamp!

general.description: Give a boost to your paper roll handling! Find your damage free handling solutions.

features: Contact pads are the most important part of the clamp attachment. In most normal handling situations, the pads are the only parts of the clamp which actually are in contact with the paper roll.

Therefore, Bolzoni Auramo has paid special attention in designing and manufacturing contact pads which will ensure safe and non-damaging roll handling. All Bolzoni Auramo contact pads have the following properties in common:
Thin pad design. The minimized pad thickness ensures good knifing properties when handling tightly stacked rolls.
Well-rounded, smooth pad profile and safe finish. The pads have no protruding parts or edges to damage the adjacent paper rolls.
Safe finish. All sharp edges have been carefully removed.
Steering front edge. The friction surface has a special form, which steers the pad easier around the roll.
Smooth wear strips on short arm side. Added safety margin against inevitable tear and wear against the floor.
Pad radius suitable for the roll diameter.
Well protected hinge system.
Positioning springs to keep the pads straight in relation to the roll. Less damage to pads and paper rolls.
Pull rods to prevent the contact pad from turning too much. Less damage to the pads and loads.

Contact pad friction surfaces: Contact pads are equipped with a wide variety of friction surfaces. The application, customer requirements and paper and wrapper type define the required friction surface. The most common friction surfaces are:
Standard models
Cast pads
Rubber-faced pads
Steel-sprayed pads
Polyurethane-faced pads
Special models
Rubber-faced pads with grooved rubber
White/brown rubber-faced pads
Sandpaper-coated pads
Carborundum-coated pads
Flexible pads with rubber band
Tissue pads
Other
Applications
Paper Roll Clamps Paper Roll Clamps Paper Roll Clamps Paper Roll Clamps

general.description: Yes, it is autolubricating. Avoid wear or damage through too low, too high or no greasing.
